name: Collision (Bruno Nova)
description:
Collision

You control a green ball. Using your mouse, keyboard or joystick, you have to avoid hitting the ever increasing number of red balls that are moving around in the game area. The moment you touch one of them, the game is over.

While dodging the red balls, collect coins to increase your score. The score also increases slowly over time.

Occasionally blue stars also appear. Collect them to receive a temporary bonus (positive or negative) effect.

Playable on the browser, but works better when downloaded for Windows or Linux.

Controls
  • Move the ball: move the mouse (recommended), arrow keys on the keyboard, or d-pad buttons on the joystick
  • Exit to the main menu: press Escape on the keyboard or Start on the joystick.
  • Toggle fullscreen: press F11 on the keyboard, or click on the respective toggle in the options menu.
